{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=WA840G |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/09/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=ACQWA840G |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed=125 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DB-90EI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=AMIC |ram1_model=A43L2616V-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94306MP |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.40.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://broadband.motorola.com/noflash/customer_docs/user_guides/509107-001.pdf User guide]
presumably OEM Gemtek, probably model WAPB-102G
This device has the same hardware as the [[Motorola WE800G v1]].
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22797 On the DD-WRT forums] :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=5935 Motorola we800g JTAG pinout - DD-WRT forums] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Motorola/WE800G WE800G on the OpenWrt wiki] :some units may have 2MB Flash and 8MB RAM
The default SSID is probably '''motorola XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the wireless interface MAC (capital letters).
